#summary Main page of the gCCD project
= gCCD =

The gCCD project aims to create an ACS-based software to operate CCD cameras. The focus is to develop a generic set of components that could be specialized to support different CCD hardware.

   * [http://goos-acs.googlecode.com/files/gCCDRequirementsSpecification.odt Requirements specification]
   * [http://goos-acs.googlecode.com/files/gCCDInstallationManual.odt Installation manual]
   * [http://goos-acs.googlecode.com/files/gCCDSystemmanual.odt System manual]
      * [http://goos-acs.googlecode.com/files/gCCD.vpp UML Diagrams (Requires Visual Paradigm)]
   * [http://goos-acs.googlecode.com/files/gCCDUserManual.odt Users manual]
